changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password_hash VARCHAR(255), status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, employee_id BIGINT NOT NULL, activation_token VARCHAR(255), activation_expires_at TIMESTAMP, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
